flawed_nl_solution:
Since 5 students from each of the 6 math classes have volunteered, there are 5*6= <<5*6=30>>30 total student volunteers.
In addition to the 30 student volunteers, 13 teachers have also volunteered so there are 30+13= <<30+13=34>>34 total volunteers.
Mr. Johnson needs 50 volunteers and currently has 34 volunteers, so he needs 50-34= <<50-34=16>>16 more volunteers.
#### 16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 43, not 34. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
